articles.title: Burger King UK's call for more female chefs backfired after tweet 'women belong in the kitchen' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Burger King UK's post was met with a barrage of criticism, with one writing: 'Did Burger King just make a sexist tweet and then gaslight everybody into thinking it was for good?'
